'''Charlie''' is one of the motorcyclists hit by a drunk truck driver.

==History==
Charlie and his friends were riding their motorcycles when a truck driver who was drunk hit them. Charlie was thrown off his bike into some bushes, where he was later found. He asked the firefighters who found him to call his boss and tell him he'd be late before passing out. Later, as Charlie was loaded into the ambulance after all his friends were killed, he asked again if someone had called his boss. And then he asked about his friends, saying they weren't a real gang, but they were a family.

==Relationships==
===Friendships===
He and some of his friends liked to ride their motorcycles one weekend a month.

==Career==
His boss's name is Dan and hates when he's late.

==Notes and Trivia==
*He was the lone survivor of his group.
